remarks.format: ## Remarks 音訊資料寫入至`outputStream`二進位格式。Audio data is written to `outputStream` in binary form. 標頭不未包含任何資訊。No header information is included. 方法使用 Wave 格式，但不包含 Wave 標頭。The method uses the Wave format, but does not include the Wave header. 若要包含 Wave 標頭，使用方法。To include the Wave header, use the method.
